name: MechWarrior 2: Ghost Bear's Legacy
description:
MechWarrior 2: Ghost Bear's Legacy is a simulation game developed by Activision. It was originally released in 1995. It was published by Activision Blizzard. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play MechWarrior 2: Ghost Bear's Legacy on PC.
It was produced by Josh Resnick. John Spinale directed the game. Gregory Alper and Jeehun Hwang scored the game.
